1.question: What ingredients are in Mayonnaise with Hard-Boiled Eggs?
1.answer:
Eggs: 2
Vegetable oil: 6tbsp(80 g)
Lemon juice: 1.3tbsp(20 g)
Salt: 1pinch
Pepper: 1pinch
Mustard: 1tsp

2.question: What ingredients are in Cream Cake?
2.answer:
Fresh liquid cream: ¾cup(200 g)
Eggs: 3
Type 00 flour: 1.6cups(200 g)
Sugar: 0.6cup(120 g)
Lemon peel: 1
Baking powder: 3 ½tsp(16 g)
Salt: 1pinch
Powdered sugar: to taste
